categories: Category:Years in the Great Peace of the Republic era

nodes.text: The following events took place in 160 BBY.

The Truce at Bakura Sourcebook states that Orn Belden is 164 years old at the time of the Bakura Incident, which takes place in 4 ABY. Although this year is not stated outright in the source material, simple mathematics arrives at a birth date of 160 BBY.
